job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

jd: From: shivani sharma, tek inspirations shivani.sharma@tekinspirations.com Reply to: shivani.sharma@tekinspirations.com Job Description -Infrastructure Project Manager6 Months Location: Coraopolis, HYBRID WORK MODEL (2 DAYS IN OFFICE) PMP or ITIL Certification MUST BE LOCAL TO PAMUST HAVE FINANCE DOMAIN or MORTGAGE INDUSTRY EXPERIENCEWhy open: Growth Business need: growth and ensure completed projects are documented currently and not impact businessQualifications: Education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience a related area (computer science, finance, business administration) (a plus).7+ years experience in IT field3-5 years' experience as a Project ManagerExpertise in managing cross-functional teamsPMP or ITIL Certification Job Responsibilities: Oversee all project budgetsLead all major projectsDefine project phases to ensure timely deliveryConducts meetings with IT Teams and Business UnitsProvide project updates and statusManage project issuesComplete project status-reviewsLead group of technical resources to ensure projects are documented correctly and moving along per planIdentify technical requirements from Business Units and IT Departments-DBA Team, Software Team and QA Team
